assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Bajaj Auto Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and distributes automobiles in India. It operates through two segments, Automotive and Investments. The company offers motorcycles, and three and four wheeler commercial vehicles, as well as spare parts. It also exports its products to approximately 79 countries in Latin America, Africa, South Asia, the Middle East, Europe, and the Asia Pacific. The company was founded in 1945 and is based in Pune, India.
